name: WitchBlade
description:
(Disclaimer: This game is fairly early in the development process, so be on the lookout for some minor bugs)

In a cyberistic future, take on the role of Ciara and Asra; a witchy-duo looking for Dusky, Ciara’s lost cat! Ciara and Asra are two witches who share the same body. Ciara’s power thrusts the world into daylight, where her magical abilities are at their best. Asra’s presence tucks the world into night, where her cold demeanor isn’t nearly as frightening as her sword. Aboard this train and find Dusky!

(This game was created for the SGDA Spring Break Game Jam)
